item.title: AI Deployment Protocol (Council Delegation)
item.description:
AI Deployment Protocol (Council Delegation)

Summary: Use different AIs as specialized processors with bounded missions. Operator remains Director; DeepSeek as primary architect; others as tactical recon, narrative, or stress-testers.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 3, 5–6

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.

item.title: AI Council Role Definitions
item.description:
AI Council Role Definitions

Summary: Council roles defined and iterated: DeepSeek as strategist/architect, ChatGPT as archivist/psych recon, Claude as narrative forge, Grok as tactical reserve/boundary tester.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 3–5

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.
